00092 ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox = function( Text , Caption , Style , AcceptResult )
00093 {
00094       if( !Caption )
00095       {
00096             Caption = 'MessageBox';
00097       }
00098       if( !Style )
00099       {
00100             Style = ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_OK;
00101       }
00102       
00103       Class = 'jsdialogs-default';
00104       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONEXCLAMATION )  Class = 'jsdialogs-exclamation';
00105       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONWARNING )            Class = 'jsdialogs-warning';
00106       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONINFORMATION )  Class = 'jsdialogs-information';
00107       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONASTERISK )           Class = 'jsdialogs-asterisk';
00108       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONQUESTION )           Class = 'jsdialogs-question';
00109       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONSTOP )               Class = 'jsdialogs-stop';
00110       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONERROR )              Class = 'jsdialogs-error';
00111       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONHAND )               Class = 'jsdialogs-hand';
00112       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING )            Class = 'jsdialogs-loading';
00113       
00114       var   id = "ultimix-MessageBox-span-" + ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBoxCounter++;
00115

00117       if( Style & ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL )                        Modal = true;
00118

00120       {
00121             jQuery( "body" ).append( '<span id="' + id + '" style="display:none"></span>' );

00129       {
